name: Observing CNAMS
description:
For my application to the CNAM school here in France, I had to make a project which included boids. It's my second time trying a game - as I lack some knowledge still I focused on the boids to learn and rather made this like a playable demo.

All assets are free assets from the Unity Asset Store !

--
I hope you'll enjoy it !
Feedbacks are appreciated. ♡
